Info.Title: Children of Men
Info.Writer: Alfonso Cuarón (screenplay), Timothy J. Sexton (screenplay), David Arata (screenplay), Mark Fergus (screenplay), Hawk Ostby (screenplay), P.D. James (novel)
Info.Actors: Clive Owen, Juan Gabriel Yacuzzi, Michael Caine, Mishal Husain
Info.Plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.
Info.Language: English, German, Italian, Romanian, Spanish, Arabic, Georgian, Russian, Serbian
Info.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 49 wins & 79 nominations.
